item.description:
Camp Constitution will host a book sale, silent auction and barbecue. items for sale will include books, magazines cassettes, videos, pamphlets. Author Sam Blumenfeld will be on hand forom 12:00-2:00 for a book signing session. Author James Perloff will be on haND FROM 10:30 TO 11:30

If you would like to donate some items for our silent auction, please call me at 857-498-1309.
All proceeds will go to Camp Constitution
item.name: Camp Constitution book sale, silent auction and barbecue
